attributes.action: Prosecute the 2 policemen for letting their german shepherds die in a car in the baking heat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Today 2 policemen in Nottingham left their police dogs in a car, and they sadly died. They suffocated in the unbearable heat. If this was any old Joe Bloggs, they would be prosecuted straight away, questioned by police and RSPCA.
However, We need these policemen to face the consequences of their very unthoughtful actions.
PROSECUTE THEM!!!

rejection.details: Government does not prosecute people. It is the role of the police to investigate suspected crimes, and of the Crown Prosecution Service to decide whether to prosecute people based on this evidence.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
